sql-query.name: peri_genes_by_microarray
sql-query.description: Find genes that have a given expression level within a given time-frame
sql-query.summary: Genes expressed greater >= ${level} times, between ${min-time} and ${max-time}
sql-query.help: Find genes that have a given expression level within a given time-frame
sql-query.sql: select g.gene_id from expression e, gene g, time_point t, where e.data > :level and e.gene_id = g.id and e.timepoint_id = t.id and t.experiment_id = '9' and t.time >= :min-time and t.time <= :max-time

param.name: level
param.description: The level by which the gene must be overexpressed
